law.text: An individual may employ private counsel to represent the individual in proceedings authorized by KRS 407.5101 to 407.5902.
law.history: Contingent effective date repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 20, effective March 23, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 33, effective upon contingency.
